dublinCore.dc:title: 119 HR 4547 IH: To advance Thomas B. Hagen on the retired list of the Navy.
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mr. Kelly of Pennsylvania introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Armed Services

form.official-title: To advance Thomas B. Hagen on the retired list of the Navy.

section.header: Advancement of Captain Thomas B. Hagen, United States Navy, on the retired list

subsection.text: Captain Thomas B. Hagen, United States Navy (retired), is entitled to hold the rank of rear admiral (lower half) while on the retired list of the Navy.
The advancement of Thomas B. Hagen on the retired list of the Navy under subsection (a) shall not affectâ€”

paragraph.text: the retired pay or other benefits from the United States to which Thomas B. Hagen would have been entitled based upon his military service; or
any benefits to which any other person may become entitled based on such military service.
